InstalledItem.Name: VariPuck S1 Gimbal Mount
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Flashfire Systems
Item Type: Weapon Mount
Size: 1

The VariPuck fits between your weapon and the ship hardpoint to transform a fixed weapon mount into a gimballed mount, allowing the pilot to independently aim their weapon’s fire. This special VariPuck will accept any weapon the same size as the hardpoint it is mounting to.

InstalledItem.Name: CF-117 Bulldog Repeater
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Klaus & Werner
Item Type: Laser Repeater
Size: 1

Featuring a three-barrel sequential fire design, the Klaus & Werner CF-117 Bulldog laser repeater is capable of delivering high velocity energy rounds while maintaining heat efficiency making it a favorite among new pilots who are outfitting their first ship.

InstalledItem.Name: Arbor MH1 Mining Laser
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Greycat Industrial
Item Type: Mining Laser 
Size: 1

Optimal Range: 30m
Maximum Range: 150m

Power Transfer: 1850
Extraction Throughput: 0.35 SCU/s
Module Slots: 1

The Arbor MH1 became the universe's most heralded mining laser thanks to Greycat Industrial's exacting standards and business prowess. The laser's solid, reliable design found favor among industrial and solo operations for effectively balancing speed and safety. Greycat capitalized on this reputation by securing exclusive contracts that made the Arbor MH1 the standard laser head on most mining ships.

The laser's solid, reliable design found favor among industrial and solo operations for effectively balancing speed and safety. InstalledItem.Name: Bulwark
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Shield Generator
Manufacturer: Basilisk 
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Industrial

The Bulwark shield generator provides industrial-grade durability and increased performance, but at the expense of a higher emission level.

InstalledItem.Name: Trommel
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Power Plant
Manufacturer: Juno Starwerk
Size: 2
Grade: D
Class: Industrial

Utilitarian to its core, the Trommel’s lack of frills has made the power plant a favorite of mechanics around the Empire.

InstalledItem.Name: Snowfall
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Cooler
Manufacturer: Juno Starwerk
Size: 2
Grade: B
Class: Industrial

Few things can be as damaging to your ship over time as excess heat build up. The Juno Starwerk Snowfall cooler helps ensure that your ship stays the right temperature for longer, which means that you can keep flying for longer.

InstalledItem.Name: Goliath
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Quantum Drive
Manufacturer: Juno Starwerk 
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Industrial

The Goliath was designed to be more durable than other quantum drives in its class. That’s made it a staple of industrial ship since Humanity first started to explore the stars.

InstalledItem.Name: Surveyor-Lite
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Radar
Manufacturer: Chimera Communications
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Industrial

There’s a lot for you to worry about on those long hauls. Don’t let your radar’s performance be one of them. You can count on the Surveyor-Lite from Chimera Communications to provide the durability and performance that you need.
